Reality Media

  • Augmented and Virtual Reality

The digital complement to Reality Media (MIT Press 2021)

Jay David Bolter, Maria Engberg, and Blair MacIntyre

The digital version of Reality Media is a complement to, not a substitute for, the printed version. This digital version allows you to get inside AR and VR, to inhabit these new reality media.
